carousel.heading: Example headline 1
carousel.message: Responsive Design: Bootstrap's grid system and responsive utilities make it easy to create layouts that adapt seamlessly to different screen sizes and devices.

carousel.heading: Example headline 2
carousel.message: Pre-designed Components: It offers a wide range of reusable HTML, CSS, and JavaScript components like navigation bars, buttons, forms, and modals, which help speed up development.

carousel.heading: Example headline 3
carousel.message: Customization and Extensibility: Developers can customize Bootstrap's default styles using Sass variables and extend its functionality with numerous plugins and themes available in the Bootstrap ecosystem.
